plot: A conscientious barista working in a dysfunctional coffee shop feels like he has been turned into a vending machine when the vintage Italian espresso model he loves is replaced with a newfangled automatic one.
title: Grounds Zero
plot_es: A conscientious barista working in a dysfunctional coffee shop feels like he has been turned into a vending machine when the vintage Italian espresso model he loves is replaced with a newfangled automatic one.
plot_en: A conscientious barista working in a dysfunctional coffee shop feels like he has been turned into a vending machine when the vintage Italian espresso model he loves is replaced with a newfangled automatic one.
